players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night. Diana, can you tell us what you saw when Bob was found dead?"
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafioso, and I'm going to accuse him."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time, but I did not kill Bob. Let's focus on finding the real killer and bring them to justice."
